EmailTemplate.subject: Update: How you will be paid for your role with The Challenge Network
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox, and replies are not reviewed. Please instead contact your Staffing representative on {!Job_placement__c.Staffing_Associate_email__c}
Dear {!Job_placement__c.Contact_Name__c},
Please accept our apologies for the previous email sent to you, which did not state your gross salary. Please see below for the corrected version of this email.
Congratulations on being appointed as {!Job_placement__c.Role__c} with The Challenge Network this summer on {!Job_placement__c.Wave__c}.
Your total pay for this role will be {!Job_placement__c.Total_gross_pay__c}, which is subject to tax and national insurance deductions. It will be paid on {!Job_placement__c.Payroll_payment_date__c}. Tax and NI deductions will happen from this payment.
This payment structure has two principles: (a) to ensure that staff members pay the appropriate level of tax in the correct month and (b) to enable staff members to receive payment.
Yours sincerely,
{!Job_placement__c.Staffing_Associate__c} The Challenge Network e: {!Job_placement__c.Staffing_Associate_email__c} CR 2.4.1 SM
